summary: This is a daily assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, NY, dated August 9, 2019. It details staff post assignments, shift changes, leave statuses (sick, annual, AWOL), and overtime/comp time occurrences for correctional officers and other personnel.

keyFacts: This is a staff assignment roster for the Metropolitan Correctional Center (MCC) in New York, dated August 9, 2019, showing no direct mention of Jeffrey Epstein or any inmates.
The document details the complex shift scheduling, post assignments, and leave management for a large number of correctional officers, indicating standard prison administrative operations.
Several officers are noted as AWOL (Absent Without Leave) or on LWOP (Leave Without Pay), highlighting personnel management issues.
Posts such as 'ATTY CONF' (Attorney Conference), 'SHU' (Special Housing Unit), and 'DRY CELL' are listed, which are relevant to high-security inmate management.
The roster includes overtime and comp time tracking, showing 29 overtime occurrences and 0 comp time occurrences for that day.
